text: the service tonight at the restaurant was not up to our expectations and the menu was lacking in freshness we will be searching for a better south park restaurant to frequent in the future

i havent enjoyed a dinner like this in a while we each ordered separate flights of wine and created our own wine tasting they have many great wines to choose from both the food and service were fantastic nnoh and its a great singles hot spot for anyone in their 30s  40s

the asian noodles that were served were overpriced and of poor quality with an excessive amount of garlic in the dish furthermore the entrees were not particularly impressive and it may be better to choose mcdonalds as an alternative
the office is dedicated to providing excellent service with a highly skilled and professional staff who ensure that you receive the best possible care

i bought an offer on groupon and was completely blown away by the quality of the service i received the moment i walked in i felt a sense of calm and serenity that only yos expertise and dedication to her patients could provide she took the time to listen to my needs and provide me with a personalized solution that exceeded my expectations i highly recommend coming back to this place and thank you for making my experience so wonderful
over a period of time i have been frequenting this location and i must say that the lulu wings are one of my top choices on the menu
